availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky tinner. England native. Married Sarah Jackson. Father of James Jackson, Joseph Jackson, and Andrew Jackson. Served in the U.S. Army during the Civil War.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 38. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 203. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 54. “John Pearce Jackson (1815-1884),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 107244214, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=107244214&ref=acom (accessed July 17, 2017). KYR-0001-005-0123. KYR-0001-005-0122.
